resources.string: Use your face to unlock your phone

"Use your face to unlock your phone.
Bear in mind that: You can only have one face set up at a time. To add another face, delete the current one.
Looking at the phone can unlock it when you don’t intend to.
Your phone can be unlocked by someone else if it’s held up to your face.
Your phone can be unlocked by someone who looks a lot like you, like an identical sibling."

Looking at the phone can unlock it when you don’t intend to.
Your phone can be unlocked by someone else if it’s held up to your face, even if your eyes are closed.
Your phone can be unlocked by someone who looks a lot like you, like an identical sibling."
How to set up Face Unlock
On the next screen, hold your phone at eye level
If you normally wear glasses, you can wear them during setup

"Delete your current face model to set up Face Unlock again.
Your face model will be permanently and securely deleted.
After deletion, you will need your PIN, pattern or password to unlock your phone."

"Delete your current face model to set up Face Unlock again.
Your face model will be permanently and securely deleted.
After deletion, you will need your fingerprint, PIN, pattern or password to unlock your phone."
To unlock the phone, your eyes must be open. For best results, take off sunglasses when unlocking the phone.
Now you can pick up your phone and use your face to unlock it
